raw_text:
SAYALI DESHMUKH 
Maharashtra | 8550931823 | saydesh02@gmail.com | www.linkedin.com/in/sayali-deshmukh-399032283 
 
SUMMARY* 
Enthusiastic and detail-focused Organic Chemist with a solid academic background and practical experience in 
organic synthesis and analytical techniques. Skilled in using tools like NMR, IR, and GC-MS to analyze and 
characterize compounds. Eager to bring creativity and precision to research and development in pharmaceuticals, 
materials, or chemical industries, contributing to meaningful innovations and reliable outcomes.  
  
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
   
Konkan Gyanpeeth Engineering College 
 
 
 
 
                                  Karjat - Raigad 
Assistant  Professor 
 
 
 
 
 
 
      
      
                      Jan 2024-Present  
 
As an enthusiastic Assistant Professor of Chemistry with 11 months of hands-on teaching experience, I take pride 
in creating engaging and relatable learning experiences for my students. I enjoy mentoring and guiding learners 
while designing curricula that bridge theoretical concepts with real-world applications. My goal is to inspire 
curiosity, foster collaboration, and support student growth while contributing meaningfully to academic research 
and innovation. 
 
LEADERSHIP EXPERIENCE 
   
BARC(Bhabha Atomic Research Center) 
 
 
 
         
 
       Trombay -  Mumbai 
Project Trainee 
 
 
     
 
        
  
        
 
 
       Jan 2023-April 2023 
 
 
I am a motivated individual with 3 months of practical experience in the Radiopharmaceuticals Department at 
BARC, where I had the opportunity to work on exciting projects. I gained hands-on experience in synthesizing 
radiopharmaceuticals, conducting experiments, and analyzing data with a focus on precision and safety. I'm 
passionate about advancing research in radiopharmaceuticals and contributing to their impactful applications in 
medicine and diagnostics. 
 
EDUCATION 
 
                                                                                                                                  
MUMBAI UNIVERSITY 
 
 
 
 
 
 
               
POST GRAUDATION IN ORGANIC CHEMISTRY                                                                       2023  
With 9.03 
 
MUMBAI UNIVERSITY  
BACHELOR OF SCIENCE                                                                                                                  2021 
With 7.83 
 
 
 
LANGUAGES:   English – Fluently 
                           Hindi – Fluently  
                           Marathi – Fluently 
 
 
INTERESTS:  Designing creative synthetic methods, NMR, IR, Chromatography, HPLC, Team Work, Purification, Time 
Management, Tutoring, Arts, Volunteering, Collecting Data. 
 
 
 
 
 
Connect with us:  
Website |  Facebook | Instagram | Tiktok | LinkedIn | Pinterest | Youtube
